puzzle.title: Political Books
puzzle.hint: The authors of each book have been modified. If you link the author to his/her actual book, the fake author of that book to the fake author's actual book, etc. you can chain the 15 books together.
Notice the stars on all the book covers?
Try using the stars to index. (Numbers are sometimes used for indexing letters. Indexing the number 5 into the word PETUNIA produces the 5th letter, N.)
Chain the books together by actual author. Then, use the stars on each book cover to index into the book's title.
The solution is MAUI'S ON WILLIAMS
